attributes.action: REDUCE OR CANCEL TV LICENSING COSTS FOR PEOPLE WITH SKY OR OTHER SUCH CONNECTIONS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: tv license doesn't make sense when you are paying for other forms of tv entertainment as the total price paid is for your package and should be either taken on by the supplier of cable or cancelled all together.Maybe the bbc should cut some bigwig wages and then they wouldn't have such a problem running

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
